data.name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Eco Fighters
data.detailed_description:
Add CA2S: Eco Fighters to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

Far in the future, the human race has expanded throughout the galaxy, welcoming an era of unprecedented prosperity.
However, with this came corruption. Large space corporations began to strip planets of their natural resources, turning them into Dread Spheres.
Dr. Moly, a scientist on Elwood, has reconstructed two fighting machines from dumped waste and entrusted them to his niece and nephew in order to save the planet.

Players: 1-2 Player Co-Op
Genre: Shooter
Versions: Japanese & English

data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 720P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
